commands.name: Power Status
commands.description: Queries the projector for the power status

response.description:
00: Standby Mode (Network OFF)
01: Lamp ON
02: Warmup
03: Cooldown
05: Abnormality standby
07: WirelessHD Standby

commands.name: Save Memory
commands.description: Saves the current settings in memory

commands.name: Vertical Keystone
commands.description: Sets the vertical keystone correction value

args.name: Specific Area (Optional)
args.description:
00: Standard
01: Gain for high-pass
02: Gain for low-pass
03: Gain for high and low-pass at the same time
04: Accentuation of H sharpness
05: Accentuation of V sharpness

args.name: Color Mode Value
args.description:
06: Dynamic
07: Natural
0C: Living
13: THX (Only THX model)
15: Cinema
17: 3D Cinema
18: 3D Dynamic
19: 3D THX (Only THX model)
20: B&W Cinema
INIT

args.name: Gamma Setting
args.description:
20: Setting 2
21: Setting 1
22: Setting 0
23: Setting -1
24: Setting -2
F0: Custom
INIT

args.name: Super Resolution Setting
args.description:
00: Setting 0
01: Setting 1
02: Setting 2
03: Setting 3
04: Setting 4
05: Setting 5
INIT

response.description:

07: Natural
0C: Living
13: THX (Only THX model)
15: Cinema
17: 3D Cinema
18: 3D Dynamic
19: 3D THX (Only THX model)
20: B&W Cinema
